article_title: Noam Chomsky's daughter talks immigration in Warrington - The Intelligencer: Bucks County
article_text:

og.description: While reports of Central American children surging across the U.S. border have made major news, the phenomenon has a long history, said Avi Chomsky at BuxMont Unitarian Universalist Fellowship in Warrington on Sunday.
